resources.string: Dear user!\n\nWe use Google Admob to show ads. Ads support our work, and enable further development of this app. In line with the new European Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we need your consent to serve ads tailored for you.
Can your data be used to show ads tailored for you?
Learn how your data is used
Yes, continue to show relevant ads
No, show ads that are irrelevant
You can change this setting anytime in the \"About\" window.
